It looks like the linker error is simply due to the linking order. Everywhere else we have `LIBBITCOIN_WALLET`, it is always before `LIBBITCOIN_COMMON`. But if you go up to where `FUZZ_SUITE_LD_COMMON` is first set, you see that we will end up having `LIBBITCOIN_COMMON` set before `LIBBITCOIN_WALLET` which means that the linker will have problems linking things common things that the wallet uses.
